# Eyes of the Eagle
## Overview
**Aura** faint divination; **CL** 3rd

**Slot** eyes

**Price** 2,500 gp

**Weight** â€”

**Description**

These items are made of special crystal and fit over the eyes of the wearer. These lenses grant a +5 competence bonus on [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] checks. Wearing only one of the pair causes a character to become dizzy and [[Stunned|stunned]] for 1 round. Both lenses must be worn for the magic item to take effect.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Clairaudience_Clairvoyance (Spell)|clairaudience/clairvoyance]]*

**Cost** 1,250 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 512
